summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Vie-Long PB14080 Special Horse Hair Shaving Brush, Red/White Acrylic Handle
Review Date: 2017/06/09
Store: Vie-Long
Product Description: ['The Vie-Long 14080 Mixed Badger and Horse Hair Shaving brush is a great looking brush with classic styling. It features an acrylic handle, with a two tone coloured barrel. The handle carries the Vie-Long branding badge and holds the Mixed Badger and Horse Hair loft.']
Average Rating: 3.8
Product Details: {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '9 x 4 x 4 inches; 1.76 Ounces', 'Item model number': '14080', 'UPC': '799289127781 796433555391', 'Manufacturer': 'Vie-Long'}
Review Text: This brush is beautiful, although mine isn't red on top. It's kind of a persimmon color, still nice actually. The bottom is clear acrylic with white swirled in, in my case, about 50% mix. It's on the smallish side, handle is 1.73" tall, 1.34" wide and the loft of the hair is 2.03".  No noticeable odor upon receiving but haven't used it yet. Need to shampoo, rinse and dry a couple times before use. This is my first horsehair brush, this one is a 75th anniversary series and seems really soft but with a lot of backbone. Hoping and expecting this brush to be a good value with performance between badger and boar. Will update review after brush has been used enough to give proper critique.  Just be aware of size and variation of color.
Review Title: Vie-Long Special Horse Hair PB14080
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Castle Forbes Lime Aftershave Balm For Men, 5 fl.oz. | Moisturizing After Shave Lotion w/ Essential Oils | Soothing & Refreshing Face Balm | Alcohol Free Post Shave Skincare For All Skin Types
Review Date: 2017/06/09
Store: Castle Forbes
Average Rating: 4.4
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Castle Forbes', 'Item Form': 'Balm', 'Item Volume': '150 Milliliters', 'Scent': 'Citrus,Lime', 'Material Type Free': 'Alcohol Free', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.94 x 1.57 x 1.57 inches; 5.29 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'CF03051', 'Department': 'Men', 'UPC': '608476030516', 'Manufacturer': 'Castle Forbes'}
Review Text: Paired with CF Lime shave cream, you can't go wrong. Key Lime pie all the way. This is a nice balm, no sting and the scent....wow!  Sometimes I use it as a night time moisturizer. Where's the Tequila!!!
Review Title: Lime Time
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: Bogazici Lemon Cologne Turkish Parfum 400 Ml / 13.5 Fl Oz
Review Date: 2017/10/25
Store: Bogazici
Average Rating: 4.0
Product Details: {'Brand': 'Bogazici', 'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Item Volume': '400 Milliliters', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '8.39 x 2.32 x 2.24 inches; 14.11 Ounces'}
Review Text: Wonderful lemon scent to freshen up with.  Has good staying power and 80% alcohol to ward off germs etc. during the cold season. Highly recommended.
Review Title: Lemon Wonder.
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: West Coast Shaving, Shaving Soap, Winter Spice. Rich Lather, Smoothe Comfortable Shave. For Men and Women.
Review Date: 2017/11/10
Store: West Coast Shaving
Product Description: ['West Coast Shaving has long been a supplier of the best in men\'s grooming. Now we are excited to bring you our own "best"! A line of vegan-friendly, luxurious, fabulously scented shaving soaps. We use them and love them. Now we offer them to you. Check out West Coast Shaving, Winter Spice, for a seasonal scent to celebrate all things fall and winter. These handmade hard soaps are loaded with a vegetable based formula. Coconut oil, vegan glycerin, and bentonite clay combined to produce a creamy, thick, rich lather. And they whip up quickly and easily so they are great for the wet shaving novice as well as the classic shaving expert. They provide phenomenal protection from the blade and a great moisturizing face feel. Whip some up with your favorite badger brush. When the cold north winds begin to blow, the leaves show off their autumn colors, and the holiday decorations go up, it is time to break out a soap that matches the season. Try out our Winter Spice aroma. This soap might remind you of a steaming mug of apple cider - loaded with warm spices and overflowing with good will. Great price, great performance, great scent - "quite possibly the world\'s greatest shaving soap". Size: 4oz. Made in the USA']
Average Rating: 3.1
Product Details: {'Brand': 'West Coast Shaving', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.2 x 3.2 x 1.1 inches; 4 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'West Coast Shaving'}
Review Text: Purchased for a gift. They said they liked it.
Review Title: Gift
Rating: 5.0
--------------------------------------------------

raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The individual's purchase history reveals a strong preference for grooming products, with consistent ratings emphasizing aesthetics and performance. The high ratings for items like aftershave balms and colognes suggest a keen appreciation for scents and soothing skincare formulations, specifically those that are moisturizing and alcohol-free. Themes of citrus and refreshing fragrances are prevalent, hinting at a preference for uplifting and invigorating scents.

Quality is evidently prioritized, as seen in their choice of premium shaving tools and artisanal soaps, although there appears to be variability in satisfaction with specific products, indicating a discerning nature. A price sensitivity is less apparent, as high-rated purchases suggest a willingness to invest in quality grooming items, yet value for performance remains a consistent expectation.

Overall, the core preferences indicate a consumer who enjoys a luxurious grooming routine focused on effective, high-quality products with appealing aromas, preferring fresh, citrusy scents for daily use and seasonal indulgence. This highlights an alignment towards brands that emphasize natural ingredients and thoughtful formulations.

target_interaction.title: Sweet Leather
target_interaction.text: As with all Geo F. Trumper products, this cologne is fantastic. The scent is a perfect match for the shave cream and aftershave splash. Love the smell of this upscale leather scent. Substantial but slightly posh, not intrusive at all. Great!
target_interaction.title_meta: Geo G Trumper Spanish Leather Cologne
